name: lambda-logger-node
description: A logger middleware for AWS Lambda functions

scripts.test:coverage: nyc --check-coverage --lines 90 npm run test:unit && npm run report
scripts.test: npm run check && npm run test:unit
scripts.test:unit:watch: npm run test:unit -s & chokidar 'src/**/*.js' 'test/**/*.spec.js' --polling -c "clear && npm run test:unit -s"
scripts.test:watch: npm run test:coverage -s & chokidar 'src/**/*.js' 'test/**/*.spec.js' --polling -c "npm run test:coverage -s"
scripts.test:ci: npm run check && blue-tape test/**/**.spec.js | tap-xunit > xunit.xml && npm run test:coverage && npm run report:ci && npm run size
scripts.test:coverage:open: npm run test:coverage && npm run report:open
scripts.check: npm run style && npm run lint

author: Tim Kye
